name: cluster_host
help: Hostname to use for the cluster scheduler. If you are trying to spin up a fresh SSHCluster, please ignore this and use --hosts instead.

name: cluster_mode
help: transport used by dask_cudf. Should be coordinated with interface. Options: IB, TCP, NVLINK

name: cluster_port
help: Which port to use for the cluster scheduler. If you are trying to spin up a fresh SSHCluster, please ignore this and use --hosts instead.

name: cluster_type
help: The type of cluster to spin up (local CUDACluster or an SSH CUDACluster). You do not need to specify the cluster_type when attaching to an already running cluster.

name: device_memory_limit
help: GPU memory limit is set ot a percent of available GPU memory

name: get_read_time
help: whether or not to track read time

name: n_workers
help: Number of worker processes to start with each call to daskcluster start_workers

name: output_dir
help: Query Output Directry. Defaults to the directory of the query script.

name: with_blazing
help: If True cluster and runners setup with suppoort for BSQL
